simulation.py

File to run whole framework given different arguments <N_CLIENTS>, <N_ITERATIONS_TILL_WRITE>, <N_GEN_POINTS_PER_CYCLE>, <TIME_TILL_REQ>

simulation.create_solution_directory(clients, number_iterations, number_generated, time_till_req)[source]

Creates the folder for the current solution “e.g., 10_5_5000_10” inside /logs/ folder.

simulation.init_logging_config()[source]

Initiates the logging configuration
